summary.span: 當從用戶端收到的要求資料中可能有包含惡意的輸入字串時，會擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a potentially malicious input string is received from the client as part of the request data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 限制並驗證使用者輸入是不可或缺的 Web 應用程式，以防止惡意的輸入字串所依賴的駭客攻擊。Constraining and validating user input is essential in a Web application to prevent hacker attacks that rely on malicious input strings. 跨網站指令碼攻擊是這種駭客攻擊的其中一個範例。Cross-site scripting attacks are one example of such hacks. 其他類型的惡意或不想要的資料可以傳遞要求中各種形式的輸入。Other types of malicious or undesired data can be passed in a request through various forms of input. 藉由限制會在應用程式中的低層級的資料種類，您可以防止非預期的事件，即使程式設計人員使用您的程式碼不要將適當的驗證技術中的位置。By limiting the kinds of data that is passed at a low level in an application, you can prevent undesirable events, even when programmers who are using your code do not put the proper validation techniques in place. 要求驗證偵測到潛在的惡意用戶端的輸入，並擲回這個例外狀況加以中止處理要求。Request validation detects potentially malicious client input and throws this exception to abort processing of the request. 要求中止可能表示有人嘗試入侵您的應用程式，例如跨網站指令碼攻擊的安全性。A request abort can indicate an attempt to compromise the security of your application, such as a cross-site scripting attack. 強烈建議您的應用程式明確檢查所有關於要求中止的輸入。It is strongly recommended that your application explicitly check all input regarding request aborts. 不過，您可以停用要求驗證設定`validateRequest`中的指示詞屬性`false`，如下列範例所示：However, you can disable request validation by setting the `validateRequest` attribute in the directive to `false`, as shown in the following example: `<%@ Page validateRequest="false" %>` 若要停用要求驗證您的應用程式，您必須修改或建立您的應用程式，將 Web.config 檔案`validateRequest`的屬性`pages`一節`false`，如下列範例所示：To disable request validation for your application, you must modify or create a Web.config file for your application and set the `validateRequest` attribute of the `pages` section to `false`, as shown in the following example: ``` ``` 若要停用要求驗證您的伺服器上所有應用程式，您可以進行此修改 Machine.config 檔案。To disable request validation for all applications on your server, you can make this modification to the Machine.config file. > [!NOTE] > 強烈建議您的應用程式明確檢查所有的輸入，它會使用除了執行 asp.net 要求驗證。It is strongly recommended that your application explicitly check all inputs it uses in addition to the request validation performed by ASP.NET. 要求驗證功能不會攔截所有攻擊，尤其是那些精心製作而成，特別是針對您的應用程式邏輯。The request validation feature cannot catch all attacks, especially those crafted specifically against your application logic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何藉由檢查是否有惡意的使用者輸入。The following code example demonstrates how to check for malicious user input by using an . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞至建構函式，或是`null`如果屬性不會不會提供內部例外狀況值給建構函式。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
